data.name: SLA_DefaultSLASelectionConfirmDialogText
data.value: Are you sure you want to set this service level agreement (SLA) record as the default for the specified entity?

data.name: SLA_DefaultSLASelectionConfirmDialogTitle
data.value: Confirm Set as Default

data.name: SLA_DefaultSLAOverrideConfirmDialogText
data.value: You have another service level agreement (SLA) record set as the default for the {0} entity. Do you want to mark the selected SLA as the default instead?

data.name: SLA_DefaultSLAOverrideConfirmDialogTitle
data.value: Change default SLA

data.name: SLA_SettingInactiveSLAAsDefaultAlertText
data.value: You cannot set an inactive SLA as the default.

data.value: Cannot set as default

data.name: SLA_DefaultSLAWarning
data.value: Selected SLA is already default

data.name: SLA_DefaultSLASetttingInProgress

data.name: SLA_ErrorResettingDefaultSLA
data.value: Something went wrong during the update of default SLA

data.name: SLA_ErrorSettingNewSLA
data.value: Something went wrong on setting the new Default SLA

data.name: SLAItem_ConfigureActionsGeneralNotification
data.value: Click on Configure Action to set up success, warning and failure actions.

data.name: SLAItem_WarningTimeHigherThanFailureTimeAlert
data.value: The warn after duration should not be greater than failure after duration

data.name: SLA_UC_Preview_Text
data.value: Actions are used to perform set of tasks, depending on whether criteria are met. Before actions can be defined, the SLA item must be saved. Click {0} for more information.

data.value: Configure pause conditions in this section to override entity-level pause configuration defined in Service Configuration and KPI-level pause configuration. {0}.

data.value: Configure pause conditions in this section to override entity-level pause configuration defined in Service Configuration. {0}.

data.value: feature documentation

data.name: SLAItem_ConditionControl_Notification_Text
data.value: We recommend that you avoid configuring the applicable when and success criteria on the same attribute.

data.name: SLAItem_ConditionOnSameAttributeAlert
data.value: We recommend that you avoid configuring the applicable when and success criteria on the same attribute. Do you want to continue?

data.name: SLAKPI_BusinessProcessError_Title
data.value: Business Process Error

data.name: SDKMessagingStepNotInActiveState
data.value: Some associated SDK message step {0} may not be in active state. Please activate the SDK message Step before activating the SLA.
data.comment: Error message when dependent SDK Message Step is not enabled. step Id.

data.name: SLAIsDisabledInSetting
data.value: Associated setting 'Disable SLAs' is enabled in service configuration settings. Please deactivate the setting before activating the SLA.
data.comment: Error message when SLA is not enabled in Service Configuration Settings.

data.name: WorkflowNotInActiveState
data.value: Some associated workflow {0} may not be in active state. Please activate the workflow before activating the SLA.
data.comment: Error message when dependent Workflow/CustomAction is not enabled.
